result.title: Second selection round WCC â€” 2018!
result.content:
The participants of Moscow International Workshop ACM ICPC have been solving problems for a week already. Meanwhile we are continuing to prepare for Winter Computer Camp 2018 because the second selection round will be on November 26 at 12:00 GMT+3.

In order to receive a login, password and link to the round, you need to register. Login and password for the access to the qualifying round will be available in your account after registration.

This year's Winter Computer Camp will be held at MIPT from February 26 to March 7, 2018.

The programme features:

  • Daily study contests: preparation to the Finals of the Open Olympiad, Technocup, National Olympiads in Programming;

  • Thematic lectures. This year each participant can compose their own curriculum out of a set of lectures;

  • Lectures by employees of MIPT base organizations on real tasks in the IT industry and professional scientists on combinatorial mathematics;

  • Sports and intellectual games.

More information can be found on the website: https://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/zksh2018
